attributes.review: the app is SO terrible! super slow! horrible & sad! it gives you fake news about the trump campaign! the app k*lled it ✨🌸 try itself next ✨🦋 get it OFF the App Store this app is homophobic, racist, transphobic, islamiphobic, sexist, xenophobic, & disgusting! this app represents r*pe! 😤
attributes.title: horrible! fake news!

attributes.review: I love this app! Great way to stay away from fake news! Trump2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 Keep America Great!
attributes.title: Best App Ever

attributes.review: Full of fake news! The pictures show a Cheeto but I thought they were supposed to show an actual person... there must be a glitch.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I’ve said it once and I’ll say it again our president has less intelligence than a brain dead ant. Someone step on him please. I’m waiting.💖🥰🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Our president has less intelligence than a brain dead ant

attributes.review: It wouldn’t let me rate it any lower. I downloaded this app and as soon as I did my eyes started to almost bleed from the horrible graphics. All over was an orange man and it made my kidneys start to fail.
attributes.title: Bleeding eyes, failing kidneys

attributes.review: i climbed😖out of⛄️my head🥊and watched⛈myself🤪implode💥a thought without🌈a body🙈ought🌼to be a shot🥳to take a 🤓load😎off🥺my brain🧠 is poisoned💉 and I’m searching🧐 for the antidote🤕 but every time⏰ iℹ️find💅🏼 it😌 my✨defenses🥊 scream😱 oh no❌ you don’t😰 woah😳
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP‼️‼️😾

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our fearless, one handed water drinker, but unfortunately it melted my eyeballs. Anyone that willingly looks at it will need serious help very soon there after. RIP everyone’s eyes.
attributes.title: Very disappointed, Donnie

attributes.review: such a terrible app it tried but well it failed🙈 super disappointing but I mean he tried💕❤️10/10 would NOT recommend this app does not live up to the orange king it’s meant for🧚‍♀️🍊
attributes.title: super disappointed🥺🙈

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app I immediately started getting weird emails and texts. Also it’s glitchy sometimes and doesn’t work very well. fix this 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.title: hacked my phone??

attributes.review: This is the worst app on the AppStore and I can’t believe it’s still on here...trust me I’ve downloaded plenty of terrible nail spa apps that make u pay money to continue playing 😔🤚 BUT this app takes the cake...actually no it don’t deserve cake😾PERIODT
attributes.title: The worst app EVER🧚
